definition: to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims

pinyin: kang4 zhen4 jiu4 zai1 zhi3 hui1 bu4

definition: to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)
emergency aid committee (of PRC Ministry of Civil Affairs 民政部)

sentences.english: Japanese community in shock, has begun relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 日本社會各界在震驚之餘，已開始全力抗震救災。

sentences.english: The rule of absolution for taking pities on destitution was related to relieving the disaster and reducing farm taxes and excising taxes.
sentences.chinese: 蠲恤則例是指救災扶荒與蠲減稅賦方面的法規或準則。

sentences.english: They decided not to count on foreign aid to relieve the famine.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定不依靠外援來救災。

sentences.english: It has also institutionalized close coordination among government ministries on the front line of disaster relief.
sentences.chinese: 還使各部委在救災前線的密切協作制度化。

sentences.english: China's air force dropped tons of disaster relief materials into the quake-stricken area.
sentences.chinese: 空軍爲災區空投了數噸的救災物災。

sentences.english: It is number-one priority to deliver these relief supplies to flood-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 把這些救災物質送到洪災區是當前的第一要務。

sentences.english: We must reinforce the relief material for the disaster-hit area.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須增加給受災地區的救災物資。

sentences.english: Going among the masses to promote harmony requires carrying forward the spirit of earthquake relief work.
sentences.chinese: “深入羣衆促和諧”要弘揚汶川抗震救災精神。

sentences.english: This transition from relief to reconstruction must take place smoothly, with sustained support.
sentences.chinese: 必須在持續的支持下，實現從救災向重建的平穩過渡。

sentences.english: Relentless, dangerous thunderstorms and heavy rains continued to slow relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 無情的是，危險的雷電和暴雨繼續減慢了救災工作。
儘管他們不遺餘力救災，但還是有11萬人殞命。

sentences.english: Donating millions to disaster relief is charity, give astranger a smile is also charity.
sentences.chinese: 捐獻幾百萬救災是慈善，給陌生人個微笑也是慈善。

sentences.english: Premier Wen Jiabao flied to Chengdu to oversee rescue operation.
sentences.chinese: 地震後，溫家寶總理第一時間趕到災區視察救災工作。

sentences.english: Bill Berger leads the U.S. Disaster Assistance Response Team, whose members are waiting for visas in Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 美國救災應急小組的成員正在曼谷等待入境簽證。

sentences.english: Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao rushed to Zhouqu county to oversee relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 中國總理溫家寶衝到舟曲縣一線視察救災工作。

sentences.english: Strange BedfellowsSurvivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的倖存者扛着救災牀墊走在北川縣城外。

definition: disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
to meet a contingency/to adapt oneself to changes
to respond to an emergency/to meet a contingency/(attributive) emergency
